VTD::ScpBuilder

VTD::ScpBuilder Class Reference

The ScpBuilder class assists with the type and syntax safe creation of ScpCommands at runtime. More...

#include <ScpBuilder.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

void beginScpCommand (const ScpCommand &command)
 Begin a new command tag, this will be the current ScpCommand. Each BeginScpCommand call must have a closing EndScpCommand call. Subsequent calls to BeginScpCommand before a closing EndScpCommand will create child tags.
template<typename T >
void addScpAttribute (const std::string &name, const T &value)
template<typename T >
void addScpAttribute (const std::string &name, const T *value)
const ScpCommand & endScpCommand ()
 End the current command tag. After a call to EndScpCommand the current ScpCommand will be the parent or 0.
std::string asString ()
template<>
void addScpAttribute (const std::string &name, const char *value)

Detailed Description

The ScpBuilder class assists with the type and syntax safe creation of ScpCommands at runtime.

Usage:

) [inline]

Add an attribute to the current ScpCommand.

std::string VTD::ScpBuilder::asString (  ) 

Get a string representation of all SCP commands created since the last asString call. Clears commands from queue.

Returns:
SCP string.

void VTD::ScpBuilder::beginScpCommand ( const ScpCommand &  command  ) 

Begin a new command tag, this will be the current ScpCommand. Each BeginScpCommand call must have a closing EndScpCommand call. Subsequent calls to BeginScpCommand before a closing EndScpCommand will create child tags.

Parameters:
command The scp command to open.
